name: What's the Deal with Hamlet?
description:
HELSINGØR, DENMARK — In the aftermath of the old King of Denmark's unexpected death, Prince Hamlet seeks to disrupt the transfer of power by presenting the royal court with shocking allegations about you - the new King, Claudius.

Can you build a coalition of supporters to hold onto your position? Can you continue to govern the country even as foreign threats emerge and supernatural occurrences begin? And really, what is the deal with Hamlet?
